xsl:variable.name: colors
xsl:variable.select: (//@css:background-color, //@css:color[not(every $i in tr:hex-rgb-color-to-ints(.) satisfies $i < 35 or parent::*[(@role, @name) = ('ZFinlineequation', 'ZFequation')] or ancestor::dbk:para/dbk:phrase[@role = ('ZFinlineequation', 'ZFequation', 'Hyperlink')] or ancestor-or-self::dbk:link or parent::*[@native-name eq 'Hyperlink'])])

template.context: dbk:para[@css:text-align='center' or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name][@css:text-align eq 'center'])] [not(parent::dbk:entry)]
dbk:para[@css:text-align='right' or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name][@css:text-align eq 'right'])] [not(parent::dbk:entry)]
dbk:para[not(@css:font-style eq 'normal')] [@css:font-style eq 'italic' or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name][@css:font-style eq 'italic'])]
dbk:para[not(@css:font-weight eq 'normal')] [@css:font-weight eq 'bold' or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name][@css:font-weight eq 'bold'])]
dbk:phrase[(@css:top[. ne '0pt'], for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name]/@css:top[. ne '0pt'])[1]]/text()

text.select: concat('\label{fig:', index-of(for $i in //dbk:figure return generate-id($i), generate-id(.)), '}')

template.context: dbk:phrase[@css:color] [not(every $i in tr:hex-rgb-color-to-ints(@css:color) satisfies $i < 35 or @role = ('ZFinlineequation', 'ZFequation', 'Hyperlink') or preceding-sibling::*[@role = ('ZFinlineequation', 'ZFequation')] or following-sibling::*[@role = ('ZFinlineequation', 'ZFequation')] or ancestor-or-self::dbk:link) and (@css:color or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name] [@css:color and not(every $i in tr:hex-rgb-color-to-ints(@css:color) satisfies $i < 35) ]))]/text()

param.select: for $i in (parent::*/@css:color, for $j in parent::*/@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$j eq @name]/@css:color)[1] return concat('color-', index-of(distinct-values((//@css:background-color, //@css:color[not(every $i in tr:hex-rgb-color-to-ints(.) satisfies $i < 35 or parent::*[(@role, @name) = ('ZFinlineequation', 'ZFequation', 'Hyperlink')] or ancestor-or-self::dbk:link or parent::*[@native-name eq 'Hyperlink'] ) ] )), $i) )

template.context: dbk:phrase[@css:font-style eq 'italic' or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name][@css:font-style eq 'italic'])]
dbk:phrase[@css:font-weight eq 'bold' or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name][@css:font-weight eq 'bold'])]

dbk:phrase[@css:font-family = ('Consolas', 'Courier New', 'Courier') or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name] [@css:font-family = ('Consolas', 'Courier New', 'Courier')])]

dbk:phrase[@css:text-decoration-line ne 'none'] [(@css:text-decoration-line[. eq 'underline'] or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name][@css:text-decoration-line eq 'underline']))] [not(@role eq 'Hyperlink')] [not(parent::dbk:link)] [not(.//dbk:link)]
dbk:phrase[@css:text-decoration-line eq 'line-through' or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name] [@css:text-decoration-line eq 'line-through'])]

dbk:phrase[(@css:letter-spacing and xs:integer(replace(@css:letter-spacing, '[a-z]+$', '')) gt 0.5) or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name] [xs:integer(replace(@css:letter-spacing, '[a-z]+$', '')) gt 0.5])]
dbk:phrase[@css:text-transform eq 'uppercase' or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name][@css:text-transform eq 'uppercase'])]
dbk:phrase[@css:font-variant eq 'small-caps' or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name][@css:font-variant eq 'small-caps'])]

dbk:phrase[not(@css:background-color eq '#FFFFFF') and (@css:background-color or exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name] [@css:background-color and not(@css:background-color eq '#FFFFFF') ]))] [not(.//dbk:footnote)]

param.select: for $i in (@css:background-color, for $j in @role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$j eq @name]/@css:background-color)[1] return concat('color-', index-of(distinct-values($colors), $i))

template.context: dbk:phrase[@css:font-style eq 'italic' or @css:font-weight eq 'bold'] [starts-with(., '$') and ends-with(., '$')]

dbk:superscript[not(dbk:footnote)]//dbk:phrase[@css:font-style eq 'italic' and not(@css:font-weight eq 'bold')] |dbk:subscript//dbk:phrase[@css:font-style eq 'italic' and not(@css:font-weight eq 'bold')] |dbk:phrase[not(dbk:footnote)][exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name] [@remap = ('superscript', 'subscript')])]//dbk:phrase[ @css:font-style eq 'italic' and not(@css:font-weight eq 'bold')]

dbk:superscript[not(dbk:footnote)]//dbk:phrase[@css:font-weight eq 'bold' and not(@css:font-style eq 'italic')] |dbk:subscript//dbk:phrase[@css:font-weight eq 'bold' and not(@css:font-style eq 'italic')] |dbk:phrase[not(dbk:footnote)][exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name] [@remap = ('superscript', 'subscript')])]//dbk:phrase[ @css:font-style eq 'italic' and not(@css:font-weight eq 'bold')]

dbk:superscript[not(dbk:footnote)]//dbk:phrase[@css:font-weight eq 'bold' and @css:font-style eq 'italic'] |dbk:subscript//dbk:phrase[@css:font-weight eq 'bold' and @css:font-style eq 'italic'] |dbk:phrase[not(dbk:footnote)][exists(for $i in ./@role return /dbk:hub/dbk:info/css:rules/css:rule[$i eq @name] [@remap = ('superscript', 'subscript')])]//dbk:phrase[ @css:font-style eq 'italic' and @css:font-weight eq 'bold']

xsl:value-of.select: .//dbk:phrase[@role eq 'hub:identifier'][1] /@xreflabel/concat('\renewcommand*{\thefootnote}{', if(matches(., '\*')) then '\fnsymbol' else if(matches(., 'ivxlcdm')) then '\roman' else if(matches(., 'IVXLCDM')) then '\Roman' else if(matches(., '[a-z]')) then '\alph' else if(matches(., '[A-Z]')) then '\Alph' else if(matches(., '[\*†‡§]')) then '\fnsymbol' else '\arabic', '{footnote}}')

template.context: dbk:equation[@condition eq 'numbered'][not(ancestor::dbk:table or ancestor::dbk:informaltable)] [not(some $i in processing-instruction() satisfies contains($i, '\begin{array}'))] [some $i in processing-instruction() satisfies contains($i, '\\')]

dbk:equation[not(@condition eq 'numbered')] [not(ancestor::dbk:table or ancestor::dbk:informaltable)] [not(some $i in processing-instruction() satisfies contains($i, '\begin{array}'))] [some $i in processing-instruction() satisfies contains($i, '\\')]

rule.text: % D2T: Equation not converted. See log for details!

template.context: dbk:phrase[@xml:lang] [@xml:lang ne $langs[1]] [normalize-space(.)] [not(ancestor::dbk:entry or self::dbk:term or self::dbk:listitem)] [not((*/local-name() = ('link', 'mediaobject', 'inlinemediaobject')) and not(normalize-space(string-join(.//text()[not(ancestor::*/local-name() = ('link', 'mediaobject', 'inlinemediaobject'))], ''))) )] [not(matches(., '^[\p{P}\p{Z}\d一-鿿԰-֏ﬓ-ﬗ]+$'))]

xsl:variable.name: start

xsl:value-of.select: concat('\begin{enumerate}[', $list-type,'] ', if($start gt 0) then concat('\setcounter{enum', $level-roman, '}{', $start, '}') else '' )

xsl:variable.name: list-type
xsl:variable.select: if($numeration eq 'loweralpha') then 'a' else if($numeration eq 'upperalpha') then 'A' else if($numeration eq 'lowerroman') then 'i' else if($numeration eq 'upperroman') then 'I' else '1'

xsl:value-of.select: string-join(for $i in (1 to max((count($indizes), count($separators)))) return if( count($separators) gt count($indizes)) then ($separators[$i], $list-type[$indizes[$i]]) else ($list-type, $separators[$i]) ,'')
